actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The bulette makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.description: The bulette spends 5 feet of movement to jump to a space within 15 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in the buletteâ€™s destination space. Failure: 19 (3d12) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the bulette.

bonus_actions.name: Leap
bonus_actions.description: The bulette jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.
